INTJ.name: Architect
INTJ.text: Thought constitutes the greatness of man. Man is a reed, the feeblest thing in nature, but he is a thinking reed.
INTJ.author: BLAISE PASCAL

INTP.name: Logician
INTP.text: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existence.
INTP.author: ALBERT EINSTEIN

ENTJ.name: Commander
ENTJ.text: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
ENTJ.author: Steve Jobs

ENTP.name: Debater
ENTP.text: Follow the path of the unsafe, independent thinker. Expose your ideas to the dangers of controversy.
ENTP.author: Thomas J. Watson

INFJ.name: Advocate
INFJ.text: Treat people as if they were what they ought to be and you help them to become what they are capable of being.
INFJ.author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

INFP.name: Mediator
INFP.text: All that is gold does not glitter; not all those who wander are lost; the old that is strong does not wither; deep roots are not reached by the frost.
INFP.author: J. R. R. TOLKIEN

ENFJ.name: Protagonist
ENFJ.text: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
ENFJ.author: MALALA YOUSAFZAI

ENFP.name: Campaigner
ENFP.text: It doesn’t interest me what you do for a living. I want to know what you ache for – and if you dare to dream of meeting your heart’s longing.
ENFP.author: ORIAH MOUNTAIN DREAMER

ISTJ.name: Logistician
ISTJ.text: I’d be more frightened by not using whatever abilities I’d been given. I’d be more frightened by procrastination and laziness.
ISTJ.author: DENZEL WASHINGTON

ISFJ.name: Defender
ISFJ.text: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.
ISFJ.author: Brian Tracy

ESTJ.name: Executive
ESTJ.text: Good order is the foundation of all things.
ESTJ.author: Edmund Burke

ESFJ.name: Consul
ESFJ.text: Encourage, lift, and strengthen one another. For the positive energy spread to one will be felt by us all.
ESFJ.author: Deborah Day

ISTP.name: Virtuoso
ISTP.text: I wanted to live the life, a different life. I didn’t want to go to the same place every day and see the same people and do the same job. I wanted interesting challenges.
ISTP.author: Harrison Ford

ISFP.name: Adventurer
ISFP.text: I change during the course of a day. I wake and I’m one person, and when I go to sleep I know for certain I’m somebody else.
ISFP.author: Bob Dylan

ESTP.name: Entrepreneur
ESTP.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
ESTP.author: Helen Keller

ESFP.name: Entertainer
ESFP.text: Live for each second without hesitation.
ESFP.author: ELTON JOHN
